summary: Completed testing of new features: Delete Diploma and Clear Scan Logs. All backend APIs (DELETE /api/diplomas/{id} and DELETE /api/scan-logs/clear) work correctly. Frontend integration verified - delete diploma option in dropdown menu with confirmation dialog, clear logs button appears when logs exist. Both features are fully functional.

issues: Clear Logs button position (x=1741) may be partially hidden by toast notification on page load

passed_tests: DELETE /api/diplomas/{diploma_id} endpoint - returns 200 with 'Diploma deleted' message
DELETE /api/scan-logs/clear endpoint - returns 200 with 'Cleared X scan logs' message
Diplomas page dropdown menu shows 'Eliminar' (Delete) option with Trash2 icon
Delete diploma confirmation dialog appears with 'Eliminar Diploma' title
Confirmation dialog has Cancelar and Eliminar buttons (red styling)
Scan Logs page displays scan log entries correctly
Clear Logs button (data-testid='clear-logs-btn') appears when logs exist
Clear Logs button hidden when no logs present (correct conditional rendering)
Clear confirmation dialog appears with 'Limpiar' button
API diplomasAPI.delete() correctly calls DELETE endpoint
API scanLogsAPI.clear() correctly calls DELETE endpoint
critical_code_review_comments: React hydration warnings in console about <tr> inside <span> in Diplomas.js table - does not affect functionality but should be addressed for cleaner HTML structure
seed_data_creation: Created test scan logs by calling verify API 3 times for certificate CERT-8857B9-2713. Test course TEST_Delete_Course was created and cleaned up during pytest execution.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Both new features (Delete Diploma, Clear Scan Logs) are working. Delete diploma uses data-testid='delete-diploma-{id}' in dropdown and 'confirm-action-btn' for confirmation. Clear logs uses data-testid='clear-logs-btn' and 'confirm-clear-btn'. Navigation to scan logs uses data-testid='nav-scan-logs' (not 'nav-scanLogs').
